column2: Large tumor on top of head, appeared very slightly lethargic in cage (reason for vet ordering it to be brought up).
brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Difficult to determine where tumor ended and skull began. From the feel of cutting it, it appeared to be largely intact with possible softness on left side.
Tumor was very white and easy to pull chunks off of it.
2 cryovials frozen and cell line attempted
